backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing feature implementations, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions with OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps TimerScreen in a ThemeProvider enabling dark mode support.
frontend/src/components/EventSelector.ts: UI dropdown for selecting a WCA event, populated from WCA_EVENTS.
frontend/src/components/ScramblePanel.ts: Card showing the current scramble with a button to generate a new one.
frontend/src/components/ScrambleVisualiz: Loads cubing.js TwistyPlayer from CDN to render a 2D scramble visualization.
frontend/src/components/TimerDisplay.tsx: Interactive timer component formatting time and displaying state-based UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/TimerScreen.tsx: Main container coordinating event selection, scrambles, visualization, timer, and instructions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on authentication identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Dfinity Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and exposing login state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaScramble.ts: React hook that asynchronously generates WCA scrambles using the cubing.net CDN and tracks loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaTimerControls.t: Implements WCA-style timer logic with keyboard and touch controls, handling arm/start/stop states and timing updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and a custom color theme for the speedcubing timer, including timer-specific color utilities.
frontend/src/lib/wcaEvents.ts: Exports a list of WCA events with IDs, names, and corresponding scramble event keys.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/cubing.d.ts: Type declarations for cubing.net scramble and twisty modules used by the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme variables, plugins, and extended timer-related color utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing implemented features, requirements, and architectural notes for the speedcubing timer.
